main event: Dr. J. Allen Hynek was invited to speak about unidentified flying objects to the Troy Rotary Club in Ohio on March 14, 1961.
interesting points: The invitation was extended by H. L. Heise from The Gummed Products Company to Dr. Hynek,The Air Force supported Dr. Hynek's involvement as a civilian scientist to lend credibility to the topic,Dr. Hynek expressed hesitance about traveling for a public talk unless it was part of his consulting services,The correspondence reveals the efforts to educate the public on UFOs and the involvement of prominent figures,The report includes multiple letters discussing arrangements for the event and the interest in UFOs.
witness description: The letters are from various individuals and organizations involved in the planning of the event.
